mainHero.title: Wismo
mainHero.subtitle: Digital Dream.
mainHero.description: Wismo is a web development company that we are specialized in creating a custom websites and web application for businesses. With a team of young enthusiastic people and with our years of experience, our aim to create unique, functional, and user-friendly websites that reflects the business's personality.

items.title: Matrimony Websites
items.description: Matrimony websites are online platforms that help people find their life partners. Read to get your life partner based on hobbies, interests, location, and more.

items.title: e-Commerce Websites
items.description: An e-commerce website is an online platform that enables businesses to sell goods or services entirely online. E-commerce allows businesses to reach a global market, providing convenience and a wide range of product options for consumers.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
